Seconds until a timeout event occurs?
Seconds idle, I assume Steam uses this to set your state to "away"

The method to be used. Ex: POST
Dictionary containing the paramters to be sent in the URL or in the Stream, depending on the method.
A cookiecontainer with cookies to send.
Special parameter, should only be used with requests that need "X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest" and "X-Prototype-Version: 1.7"
Sets the referrer for the request.
member.returns: A string from the response stream.

member.summary: Retries a Fetch until success or fail conditions have been met.
member.param: The TimeSpan in which to wait between requests.
The max number of requests to perform before failing.
The URL to request.
The method to be used. Ex: POST
Dictionary containing the paramters to be sent in the URL or in the Stream, depending on the method.
A cookiecontainer with cookies to send.
Special parameter, should only be used with requests that need "X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest" and "X-Prototype-Version: 1.7"
Sets the referrer for the request.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Web.Web.RetryRequestProcessor(System.TimeSpan,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Processes retry attempts

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Web.Web.DoLogin(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes the web login using the Steam website.
member.param: Username to use
Password to use

Steam machine auth string. You should save Web.SteamMachineAuth after the code has been entered and the request has been successful and pass it to DoLogin in future attempts to login. This field can be left blank, but if the account is SteamGuard protected it will ask you for a new code every time.
member.returns: An Account object to that contains the SteamId and AuthContainer.

member.name: M:CSharpTradeOffers.Web.Web.RetryDoLogin(System.TimeSpan,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retries the DoLogin method until success or fail conditions have been met.
member.param: The TimeSpan in which to wait between requests.
The max number of requests to perform before failing.
Username to use
Password to use

Steam machine auth string. You should save Web.SteamMachineAuth after the code has been entered and the request has been successful and pass it to DoLogin in future attempts to login. This field can be left blank, but if the account is SteamGuard protected it will ask you for a new code every time.
